mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title item_title, a.sell_point item_sell_point, a.price item_price, a.image item_image, b.name item_category_name, c.item_desc item_desc FROM tb_item a JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id JOIN tb_item_desc c ON a.id = c.item_id WHERE a.status = 1

SELECT a.id, a.title item_title, a.sell_point item_sell_point, a.price item_price, a.image item_image, b.name item_category_name, c.item_desc item_desc FROM tb_item a JOIN tb_item_cat b ON a.cid = b.id JOIN tb_item_desc c ON a.id = c.item_id WHERE a.status = 1 AND a.id=#{itemId}
